about_the_game:
In the park of lights and cheer,

Big Jinx the clown was loved so dear.

But envy’s shadows crept so near,

He was murdered filled with despair.

Returning from midnight’s sphere,

his bloody hammer turned joy into fear.

Grandma told me,

what was hidden behind smiles,

were tears.

What is the game about:

Today is your first day working at this amusement park. You have only one job: to work the night shift. However, everything seems far from simple: the noisy radio, the always-disconnected phone, and a fog that envelops the amusement park, filling the air with a spooky and disturbing atmosphere. Have you heard that terrifying story? A friendly clown was killed instead and became evil! They say he's still roaming around... Shhh, better be cautious. Remember, the security booth is the only safe place.

Key features:

  • First-person horror game, immersive experience!

  • Multiple scenes with different mechanisms.

  • Rich light and sound effects to enhance the immersion of the horror amusement park.

  • Fight back against your enemies, no longer just hiding!

This game is created by @radiosity with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: From the Last Shift: Horror Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Last Shift is a first-person adventure horror game. At midnight, demons roam the amusement park while you are alone on the night shift in the security booth. Collect clues, solve puzzles, face your enemies, and strive to survive the night!
